forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 1 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The night drapes faintly over Downtown San Francisco, with a crispness in the air that whispers of fall. As the city settles into slumber, the low temperature hovers around 51, gently rising as dawn approaches. The skies are undeniably clear, heralding a sunny embrace for the day ahead. Expect the sun to climb high, pulling the temperature toward a pleasant 67, though it may dip slightly as the afternoon unfolds, settling around 62. The northeast wind dances softly at around 5 mph, bringing with it a fresh breath that enhances the calm of the night.

As you contemplate the day ahead, the landscape beckons with promise. With minimal fog and no marine layer to disrupt visibility, this is a day tailor-made for explorations – perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the golden hues of the sun will shimmer against the bay. Dressing in layers will ensure comfort throughout the day; a light sweater will suffice as the sun rises, with breezy moments reminding you that San Francisco is never far from a cool embrace. As evening approaches, consider cozying up at a nearby café, where you can sip a warm beverage while watching the sun retreat behind the hills. A day like this deserves to be savored, offering an invitation to relish the simple joys that make San Francisco an enduring delight.
